text:
The PS-Renderer emits lots of redundant moveto instructions. In my production
files, this amounts to between 10 and 50% (yes!) increased file size.

A diff with a fix follows.
creator: arnd.beissner@cappelino.de
arnd.beissner@cappelino.de
text:
Created attachment 4442
patch for redundant movetos, run against cvs fop 0.20.5rc as of 2003-01-15

creator: christian.geisert@isu-gmbh.de
text:
Committed to maintenance branch (I'll commit it to HEAD later)
Thanks for your contribution
FOP 0.95 doesn't create unnecessary movetos AFAICT.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
